content: {"name": "Newark School of Fashion & Design", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Summer meal program\nCoordinator: Ayana\tGreenwood\t9737337170\nStart: 08/18/2025\tEnd: 08/22/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "239 Woodside Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Forest Hill", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07104", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7743659, "longitude": -74.1646023}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 733-7170", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "12:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
